net.ontopia.topicmaps.impl.basic
Class TopicMap

java.lang.Object
  net.ontopia.topicmaps.impl.basic.TMObject
      net.ontopia.topicmaps.impl.basic.TopicMap
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, ReifiableIF, TMObjectIF, TopicMapIF, EventListenerIF, EventManagerIF
public class TopicMap
extends TMObject
implements TopicMapIF, EventManagerIF

INTERNAL: The basic topic map implementation.
